user.title: Search for a Game
user.description: Search for a game to track prices. Found {games_count} games in our data source catalog.

data_description.game_query: Enter the name of the game you want to track (e.g., 'FIFA' or 'Call of Duty')

select.title: Select Game and Currency
select.description: Choose the game from the search results and select your preferred currency.

error.no_games_found: No games found matching your search. Please try a different search term.
error.invalid_selection: Invalid game selection. Please try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the price tracking service.

init.title: KeyforSteam Options
init.description: Configure price alerts and other settings.

data_description.price_alert_threshold: Get alerted when price drops below this value (0 = disabled)

api_failure.title: KeyforSteam API Connection Failed
api_failure.description:
The integration has been unable to fetch price data for over 24 hours. This may indicate that the API has changed.

Please check for updates or report this issue: {issue_url}

product_not_found.title: KeyforSteam Product Not Found
product_not_found.description:
The product {product_name} was not found on KeyforSteam (404 Error). This might be because the game was removed or the URL has changed.

Please re-configure the integration or report this issue if it persists: {issue_url}
